sentences.sContent: All of a sudden a storm broke – a regular cloudburst.
sentences.sContent_eng: All of a sudden a storm broke – a regular cloudburst.
sentences.sCn: 突然暴风雨来临了—一场常见的大暴雨。

sentences.sContent: A dramatic cloudburst releases jagged bolts of lightning deep into the Grand Canyon near Point Sublime.
sentences.sContent_eng: A dramatic cloudburst releases jagged bolts of lightning deep into the Grand Canyon near Point Sublime.
sentences.sCn: 突发的倾盆大雨向崇敬角附近的大峡谷深处释放了一道锯齿状闪电。

sentences.sContent: The cloudburst masterplan for Copenhagen, the capital of Denmark, is an example of an ambitious effort to protect the city against future heavy rain events.

sentences.sCn: 作为此方面的典范，丹麦首都哥本哈根市的暴雨防控规划提出了一套雄心勃勃的计划，旨在帮助城市免受未来的暴雨之害。
